channel.title: France on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in France on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Guillaume Campanacci Gets Thrifty With Oldenburg’s ‘The Silent Sinner’: “It Was Made for Literally Nothing”
item.description: The French director also stars in his new silent movie, born out of his desperate urge to return to the Oldenburg Film Festival: “I needed something that I could make for not a lot of money and fast.”

item.title: Guillaume Campanacci Gets Thrifty With Oldenburg’s ‘The Silent Sinner’: “It Was Made for Literally Nothing”
item.description: The French director also stars in his new silent movie, born out of his desperate urge to return to the Oldenburg Film Festival: “I needed something that I could make for not a lot of money and fast.”

item.title: Gérard Depardieu to Stand Trial on Rape Charges
item.description: A French investigating judge has ordered the French actor to be tried in a criminal court over an alleged 2018 rape of actress Charlotte Arnould.

item.title: Gérard Depardieu to Stand Trial on Rape Charges
item.description: A French investigating judge has ordered the French actor to be tried in a criminal court over an alleged 2018 rape of actress Charlotte Arnould.

item.title: Telluride: Richard Linklater on ‘Nouvelle Vague,’ Selling It to Netflix and France’s Oscar Choice

item.title: Researcher threatens X with lawsuit after falsely linking him to French probe
item.description: Musk’s X refuses to give French cops “real-time data about all user posts."
